definitions.definition: The word "damn" employed as a curse .
examples: He said a few damns and left.

definitions.definition: A small, negligible quantity, being of little value; a whit or jot .
examples: The new hires aren't worth a damn .
definitions.label_groups: sometimes vulgar , chiefly in the negative

definitions.definition: The smallest amount of concern or consideration .
definitions.label_groups: sometimes vulgar , chiefly in the negative

main_definition: ( sometimes vulgar ) The word "damn" employed as a curse .
secondary_definitions: ( sometimes vulgar , chiefly in the negative ) A small, negligible quantity, being of little value; a whit or jot .
( sometimes vulgar , chiefly in the negative ) The smallest amount of concern or consideration .
